headline: How Buttigieg, a Star in Iowa, Tailors His Message for South Carolina
abstract: Mr. Buttigieg is the star of the show at his campaign rallies in Iowa, where his crowds are virtually all white. In South Carolina, in front of black audiences, he still needs help telling his story.
lead_paragraph: WEST DES MOINES, Iowa â€” When Pete Buttigieg was asked Thursday if it worried him that mostly white people attended his big rallies in South Carolina, he said yes.
